title: [1.12.2][Primal tech——原始工艺]
author: 6B不止铅笔
txt_content:
前言搬运悬赏令：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-643850-1-1.html
介绍该mod所有的功能性方块都是交互式的，没有GUI。支持Crafttweaker进行魔改，原生支持JEI查看合成表。默认情况下，该mod仅包含基本的合成表，因为此mod的本意就是用来扩展前期游戏可玩性的。在游玩时推荐搭配JEI食用。
搬运授权截止2019.12.31，作者仍未回复，所以暂无授权


下载地址下载链接：https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/primal-tech/files/all
下载方法打开页面，点击“Files”，找到“Game Version”旁的“All Version”选择框并点击选择你想要下载的版本
图片













关于curseforge打开慢的问题这里贴的是酒石酸dalao的教程：https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv151746
关于汉化请安装酒石酸dalao的自动汉化更新模组：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-805273-1-1.html
mod更新日志（从我搬运的版本开始）2019.10.4
Small fixes Release.
* Added config option so people can see the explody blocks about to break, due to Darkosto being a wuss and possible heart related jumpscare health risks :P
Packmakers should note this adds 2 extra states for the Workstump, Upgraded Workstump, and the Stone Anvil and alro required a small change to the configs.
New Texture resources for the above changes were needed so be aware if resource packs are used.
* Fixed clay Kiln not 'baking' when empty (I think).
* Improved performance for Wooden Hoppers by removing intensive block updates.
* Thanks to you know who for helping with the resource changes.
本帖更新日志2019.12.31：本贴发布[groupid=1645]Nuclear Fusion[/groupid]
